class.name: B4R::B4RAda_NeoPixel
class.comment: Wrapper for Adafruit NeoPixel (WS2812 / WS2812B) LED strips and matrices. Provides pixel‑level control, brightness management, and colour helpers.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialises the NeoPixel strip or matrix. NumberOfPixels The total number of LEDs in the strip or matrix. Pin The GPIO pin used for the NeoPixel data line. PixelType The pixel format flags such as NeoGRB + NeoKHZ800.

method.name: Begin
method.comment: Prepares the NeoPixel driver for operation. Must be called after Initialize before any pixel updates.

method.name: Show
method.comment: Sends the internal pixel buffer to the LEDs. Call this after modifying pixel colours to update the display.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Clears the internal pixel buffer (sets all LEDs to off). Call Show afterwards to apply the change to the LEDs.

method.name: SetPixelColor
method.comment: Sets the RGB colour of a single pixel. Index The pixel index (0‑based). Red The red component (0‑255). Green The green component (0‑255). Blue The blue component (0‑255).

method.name: SetPixelColorW
method.comment: Sets the RGBW colour of a single pixel. Index The pixel index (0‑based). Red The red component (0‑255). Green The green component (0‑255). Blue The blue component (0‑255). White The white component (0‑255) for RGBW strips.

method.name: SetPixelColorPacked
method.comment: Sets a pixel using a packed 32‑bit colour value. Index The pixel index (0‑based). Colour The packed colour created by Color() or ColorW().

method.name: Fill
method.comment: Fills a range of pixels with a single packed colour. Colour The packed colour value. First The starting pixel index. Count The number of pixels to fill.

method.name: SetBrightness
method.comment: Sets the global brightness level. Brightness A value from 0 (off) to 255 (maximum brightness). Note: This does not modify stored pixel colours.

method.name: GetBrightness
method.comment: Returns the current global brightness level. Returns A value between 0 and 255.

method.name: GetPixelColor
method.comment: Returns the packed 32‑bit colour value of a pixel. Index The pixel index (0‑based). Returns The packed colour value.

method.name: GetNumPixels
method.comment: Returns the number of pixels configured during Initialize().

method.name: Neo_GRB
method.comment: Returns the GRB colour order flag. Use this for WS2812B and most modern NeoPixel strips.

method.name: Neo_KHZ800
method.comment: Returns the 800 KHz timing flag. Required for WS2812 / WS2812B LEDs.

method.name: Neo_RGB
method.comment: Returns the RGB colour order flag. Used by some older or non‑standard LED strips.

method.name: Neo_KHZ400
method.comment: Returns the 400 KHz timing flag. Used by older WS2811‑based strips.

method.name: MovePixel
method.comment: Moves a pixel from one index to another. From The source pixel index. To The destination pixel index.

method.name: AnimatePixelColor
method.comment: Animates a pixel sequence from Start to Finish. Start The first pixel index. Finish The last pixel index. Colour The packed colour value. Delay Time each pixel stays lit (ms).

method.name: SetRGB
method.comment: Creates a packed RGB colour value. Red The red component (0‑255). Green The green component (0‑255). Blue The blue component (0‑255).
